fulltext:
Address: 332/8 Cach Mang Thang Tam, Dist. 3, HCMC
Mobile: 0986 990 248
Date of Birth
   :   5/5/1990
Email: uyen5590@gmail.com 
VU NGOC TU UYEN
EXPERIEN
CES
Digital
Marketing
Leader
–
CJ
CGV
Vietnam
5/2018 - Present
•
Design and implement yearly and monthly Digital Strategy to align
with business goals.
•
Manage social media team to generate and publish daily content on
Facebook, Instagram and Zalo.
•
Coordinate SEM & SEO activities to optimize the website’s
performance.
•
Propose seasonal promotion campaigns. Measure and report the
effectiveness of each campaign.
•
Stay up-to-date with current and trends in Social Media.
•
Build a complete entertainment ecosystem for CGV on digital
platforms, including optimize website, create movie information
portal, entertainment website. Work with IT team for UX/UI & CSS.
•
Prepare monthly report and analysis to evaluate the performance of
each digital channel.
•
Communicate with partners and digital agencies to ensure
consistent brand image.
Senior Digital Marketing – ZALORA Vietnam (Central Group)
10/2015 – 4/2018                                          
•Managing all SEM channels for Zalora business, including SEM, GDN,
Coccoc, Retargeting and Social Media platforms.
•Working closely with Coccoc, Retargeting agencies and regional
Google team on multiple ads channels to optimize outcome within
allocated budget.
•Getting requirements from Campaign Management team regarding
monthly campaigns. Liaising with Design team to deliver productive
artworks across all platforms.
•Utilizing keyword tools to research on high-volume keywords and
develop effective bidding strategy to optimize performance and meet
target provided.
•Coordinating with Internal Production team to optimize landing pages
and other technical issues.
•Analyzing and reporting on the performance of the campaigns via
Google Analytics, Facebook Insights in the effort of achieving KPIs and
maximizing results.
•Staying up-to-date with emerging technologies and the evolving
digital landscape to identify relevant first-to-market opportunities.
Digital
Marketing
Executive
–
Trung
Thuy
Group
5/2012 – 5/2015
•Planned, budgeted and implemented integrated marketing
campaigns.
•Ran online advertising campaigns: Google Ads, Coccoc Ads, GDN,
Facebook Ads.
•Developed idea for marketing materials, including infographic,
brochure, banner, leaflet...
•Created SEO-friendly content for website, blog posts and produce
attractive storyboard for video marketing.
•Managed social media platform (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram) to
promote and engage with potential customers.
•Brainstormed and executed online interactive activities (contests and
games) in order to improve brand awareness among potential clients.
•Produced PR articles, press kit, advertorial, newsletter, blog posts... to
increase online awareness through social media, websites, and direct
mailings.
•Measured and reported performance of all digital marketing
campaigns, and assessed against goals.
SKILLS
•
Proficient in using Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
•
Proficiency in social media (Facebook, Twitter,  Linkedin, Google+).
•
Be able to work effectively as a team player, and earn the trust of
both junior and senior colleagues.
•
Dynamic, positive, self - motivated, detail – oriented, energetic and
fast learner.
•
Promptly adapt to a multi-cultural setting with strong interpersonal
skills.
EDUCATIO
N
Bachelor of Commerce                                                                        
2/ 2010 – 11/ 2012
RMIT International University, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam     
Master of Business Administration
RMIT International University, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam                    
2/2014 – 5/2015
REFEREES
Ly Khanh Quynh Vy – Marketing Manager
Mobile: 0933 462 294
